bibl.title: The Contribution of Papyri to the Prosopography of the Ancient World: Evaluation and Prospects.
Fifty Years of Prosopography. The Later Roman Empire, Byzantium and Beyond
bibl.author: CARRIÉ, Jean-Michel

bibl.note: The peculiarities of papyrological material from the point of view of prosopography. - Categories of papyrological prosopography. - What sort of prosopography, and for what purpose? - Prospects for the twenty-first century. - Conclusion.
CARRIÉ Jean-Michel, The Contribution of Papyri to the Prosopography of the Ancient World: Evaluation and Prospects.
Averil CAMERON (Ed.), Fifty Years of Prosopography. The Later Roman Empire, Byzantium and Beyond = Proceedings of the British Academy. 118 (Oxford - New York, 2003) pp. 73-93.
